description: Super soft, ultra-flexible, and with the classic style of five-pocket jeans, the Revolt™ may be the most comfortable pair of pants you’ve ever worn. Designed for superior freedom of movement, the versatile Revolt features stretch with rebound, maintaining form and fit. From the office to the trail, style, comfort, and performance.
name: Kuhl Revolt Jeans, Tapered, 30" Inseam - Mens
